snippet: Rehman Malik, a close aide of the president, said that he had surrendered his British nationality, but that he could not provide the necessary proof on Monday.

byline.original: By SALMAN MASOOD and DECLAN WALSH

lead_paragraph: Rehman Malik, a close aide of the president, said that he had surrendered his British nationality, but that he could not provide the necessary proof on Monday.

headline.seo: Pakistani Official Suspended in Dual-Nationality Case
headline.main: Pakistani Court Bars Interior Minister Over Dual-Nationality Claim
headline.print_headline: Pakistani Court Suspends Interior Minister Over Dual-Nationality Claim
